content: knit these beautifully textured beanies using the dot stitch which staggers purl stitches among knit stitches for a lovely dotted look this beanie works up quickly using bulky level 5 yarn and sizing is available for adult child and baby the free knit patterns can be found *** here 1 *** you can find the matching **bulky dotty cowl** pattern *** here 2 *** note that the pdf for purchase includes the **adult child and baby sizing for the bulky dotty beanie** the cowl is not included in this pdf as it is a separate blog post and pattern available for purchase if you would like to use worsted weight level 4 yarn check out my ** dotty beanie *here* 4 ** if you would like to use super bulky level 6 yarn check out my ** chunky dotty beanie *here* 5 ** 1 https //www allaboutami com/bulky-dotty-beanie/ 2 https //www allaboutami com/bulky-dotty-cowl/ 3 https //www allaboutami com/bulky-dotty-beanie/ 4 https //www allaboutami com/the-dotty-beanie-knit-pattern/ 5 https //www allaboutami com/chunky-dotty-beanie-adult/
